publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3288 Pauline McNeill: HMI Inspection of Glasgow College of Building and Printing —That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow College of Building and Printing on its excellent outcome in the HM Inspectorate of Education subject review; notes that, in particular, the college deserves praise for its monitoring of student destinations, its outreach initiatives for black and ethnic minority women, its commitment to lifelong learning and its efforts to ensure that 42% of students come from Social Inclusion Partnership areas, and offers its best wishes to the Principal and staff in meeting the challenge of Glasgow’s construction skills shortage.R
S1M-3288 HMI Inspection of Glasgow College of Building and Printing (lodged on 23 July 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*
S1M-3288 HMI Inspection of Glasgow College of Building and Printing (lodged on 23 July 2002) Bill Butler*
S1M-3288 HMI Inspection of Glasgow College of Building and Printing (lodged on 23 July 2002) Elaine Smith*
S1M-3288 HMI Inspection of Glasgow College of Building and Printing (lodged on 23 July 2002) Helen Eadie*
